Authors: Viktor Kucera, Slavomir Valda, Anna G. Fedosova
Title:
New records of earth tonuge Leucoglossum leucosporum in
Central Europe
Abstract:
The earth tongue, Leucoglossum leucosporum, is recorded
for the first time from the Czech Republic and Slovakia. Macroscopic and
microscopic characters of studied collections are described and are
compared with other researches. A phylogenetic reconstruction based on a
combined data set of nrITS15.8SITS2 and nrLSU is provided. Occurrence of
long brown ascospores as a diagnostic feature is questioned.
